name: GhostBusters AR: Slimer Hunt
description:
Live the experience of hunting a ghost with a proton gun and a ghost trap

and became the next ghostbuster

This is an augmented reality game played with Oculus Quest 2 

the Slimer  ghost is walking around freely in your house now

who will you gonna call? the ghostbusters team 

or you will trap the ghost by yourself 

Don't be afraid and enjoy it now 

(( Haptic Feature Enabled )) Phaptic Support Game
